attributes.action: Please don’t count student loan as income
attributes.additional_details: Because only government or parliament can do this this should not count as income that people have more chance to get better jobs
attributes.background: At moment universal credit count student loan as income but this is a loan have to be paid back

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/652968
